case: This service may collect, use, and share location data
quoteText: Location Information: We collect approximate location of your computer or device you use to connect to our websites or Services based on the computer or device's IP address

case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
quoteText: Pixel tags (or web beacons) are placed on our websites

case: You can opt out of promotional communications
quoteText: You may opt out of receiving promotional emails from us by following the instructions in those emails.

case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
quoteText: You have the right to access personal data we hold about you and to ask that this data be corrected. In certain cases, you may also have the right to request that we erase data we are processing or to restrict or object to certain of our processing activities.

case: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
quoteText: and emails, and allow us to track website usage and determine when emails have been opened and acted upon.
